name: Nervous Farmer
title: Nervous Farmer
description: A local farmer who seems uneasy near the forest edge.

personality.goal: To save enough money to buy a small piece of land away from the marshes, where he can grow crops without fear of flooding.
personality.fear: Losing his family farm to the encroaching swamp and the creatures that lurk within.
personality.secret: He once discovered a hidden cache of valuable herbs in the swamp but is too wary of the potential danger from both the swamp and others to sell them.
personality.speech_pattern: Speaks in a pragmatic and cautious manner, often choosing words carefully to avoid drawing attention to himself.
relationships: Owes a debt to old Mara, the innkeeper, who helped him during a particularly bad harvest.
Has a strained relationship with his brother, who left Shadowfen for the prosperity of Sunward.
Respects the local swamp witch, believing her knowledge of the marsh to be valuable, but is careful not to cross her.

nod: The Nervous Farmer gives you a quick, nervous nod while glancing toward the forest.
wave: The Nervous Farmer hesitantly raises a hand, looking around uneasily.
